Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs out of all completed reimbursement cases (i.e., those ending in 'Payment Handled')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' compared to the frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of process variants that include 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' among all variants leading to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' is immediately followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Number of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' appears more than once in the same case (indicating rework)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Percentage of total activity executions in the log that correspond to 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' that also include 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' in a subsequent resubmission cycle
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' in cases with total Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' that directly precedes 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' without intermediate rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' events that occur in the same case as at least one 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of successful paths to 'Payment Handled' that include 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' versus those that bypass it (e.g., going directly from ADMINISTRATION to SUPERVISOR)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurrences that eventually lead to rejection (e.g., followed by any 'Declaration REJECTED by ...' activity)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' in variants that do not involve any rejection steps, compared to its frequency in variants that include at least one rejection
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities that occur after a rejection by ADMINISTRATION or PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases
